body:
Temporary WAR for TRT allocator. Some cuda API calls require allocated gpu memory to abide to cudaDeviceProp::textureAlignment. The specific call that's causing the error: https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-runtime-api/group__CUDART__TEXTURE__OBJECT.html

Advised by the TRT team to just override it to 512.
